verbs.description: The Treasury secretary [V: is] trying to quell criticism of Trump 's offer to keep the Chinese company in business
[ARG0: The Treasury secretary] is [V: trying] [ARG1: to quell criticism of Trump 's offer to keep the Chinese company in business]
[ARG0: The Treasury secretary] is trying to [V: quell] [ARG1: criticism of Trump 's offer to keep the Chinese company in business]
The Treasury secretary is trying to quell criticism of Trump 's offer to [V: keep] [ARG1: the Chinese company] [ARG2: in business]
